sentence.text: Single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in telomere maintenance via telomerase have been associated with risk of cancer, which strengthens the role of WRAP53 in the pathogenesis of human malignancies.
In transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter, telomere maintenance via telomerase has been considered as a candidate cancer susceptibility gene.

entity.text: transcription elongation from RNA polymerase II promoter

sentence.text: Accordingly, we performed a study to examine the association of a frequent genetic variation in telomere maintenance via telomerase, rs2287499 (C/G), with breast cancer risk and prognosis among Iranian-Azeri population.
